about_the_game:
Anshan packs a hefty punch in the torpedo department, and she's decked out with hard-hitting guns.

Key features:

  • Main battery guns are effective at all ranges
  • Choice of modules available
  • Low gun traverse speed

This package includes:

  • Anshan, Pan-Asian Tier VI destroyer
  • 1,500 Doubloons
  • Pan-Asian Commander with 6 skill points
  • Port slot

If you already have this ship in your Port, you will not receive any compensation for her.

The content of this DLC is only playable on World of Warships accounts created via Steam and will be invoiced on your Wargaming Account only once.
detailed_description:
Anshan packs a hefty punch in the torpedo department, and she's decked out with hard-hitting guns.

Key features:

  • Main battery guns are effective at all ranges
  • Choice of modules available
  • Low gun traverse speed

This package includes:

  • Anshan, Pan-Asian Tier VI destroyer
  • 1,500 Doubloons
  • Pan-Asian Commander with 6 skill points
  • Port slot

If you already have this ship in your Port, you will not receive any compensation for her.

The content of this DLC is only playable on World of Warships accounts created via Steam and will be invoiced on your Wargaming Account only once.

  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4570R
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000, Intel Iris 5100

  • Additional Notes: 1280×720

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M
